detaileddescription.para: The epoch manager component vt::epoch::EpochManip, accessed via vt::theEpoch(), manages termination epochs that are allocated and deallocated as a program executes to encapsulate and order distributed work. The epoch manager controls the bits allocated for these along with scopes (distinct, collective strands of epoch bit allocation) for generating the bits. The epoch manager also allows inspection of information embedded in the epoch bit field vt::EpochType that encodes the epoch type, category, scope, rank, etc.
